sentences.en: A high performance thermoplastic polyester elastomer with food compliance specificity.
sentences.cn: 高性能热塑性聚酯弹性体食品级特异性.

sentences.en: A low modulus high performance thermoplastic elastomer with compliance specificity.
sentences.cn: 低模量高性能热塑性弹性体的食品级特异性.

sentences.en: A trademark used for a transparent thermoplastic acrylic resin enamels, and primers.
sentences.cn: (商标名称)一种透明的热塑性丙烯酸树脂.

sentences.en: Apply to all parts of thermoplastic and thermosetting plastics.
sentences.cn: 适用于全部热塑性塑料和部分热固性塑料.

sentences.en: Chatergories and performances of resins for thermoplastic powder coatings are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了热塑性粉末涂料用树脂的种类和性能.

sentences.en: CNBRP and PVC were mechanically blended and prepared as a thermoplastic elastomer.
sentences.cn: 采用羧基丁腈胶粉(CNBRP)与聚氯乙烯(PVC)高温机械共混,制备共混型热塑性弹性体.

sentences.en: Composition and application of thermoplastic marking paint are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了热熔型道路标线涂料的组成及其施工方法.

sentences.en: Fox, like most inventors, was already on the next project, becoming champion for a new thermoplastic called PPO (polyphenylene oxide).
sentences.cn: 福克斯，就像大多数的发明者一样，已经开始了下一个新项目的—新耐热塑料PPO（聚亚苯基氧化物）的研发。

sentences.en: Hot - melt adhesives - thinner called hot - melt adhesives, solvent - free is a solid thermoplastic adhesive.
sentences.cn: 热熔胶型粘剂又称热熔胶, 是一种无溶剂的热塑性固体胶粘剂.

sentences.en: Made from thermoplastic acrylic acid resin, color, organic solvents and addictives.
sentences.cn: 由热塑性丙烯酸树脂 、 颜料 、 有机溶剂及助剂精制而成.

sentences.en: Of this quantity 15 % was added to thermoset ant 85 % to thermoplastic polymers.
sentences.cn: 其中15%加于热固性聚合物,85%加于热塑性聚合物.

sentences.en: The fabric is used as preform for thermoplastic textile - reinforced composite modules.
sentences.cn: 这种织物被用作热塑性纺织增强复合材料模件的预型件.

sentences.en: The PEN is a thermoplastic polyester with high performance.
sentences.cn: EN是一种高功能热塑性聚酯.

sentences.en: The tubular clamp device is made of thermoplastic material.
sentences.cn: 并且所述管状夹紧装置由热塑性材料制成.

sentences.en: There's a skeleton made of thermoplastic polymer, actuators that correspond to each muscle and kiteline as tendons.
sentences.cn: 他们研制的新型机器人的“骨骼”是由热塑性聚合物和促动器构成的，响应每一块肌肉和类似筋腱的线路的运动。

sentences.en: Thermoplastic and thermosetting substances are called plastics.
sentences.cn: 热塑塑料和热固的物质称为塑料.

sentences.en: They manufacture the class of plastics known as thermoplastic materials.
sentences.cn: 他们生产这类被称为热塑材料的塑料制品。
